Method Detail

getCollectionItem

@RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object getCollectionItem(@RequestParam(value="itemid")
                                               long itemID)
GET method designed to handle retrieving CollectionItem data from the database. This method supports the following parameters:
  • itemid=<itemID>

Parameters:
itemID -
Returns:
A CollectionItem object or SimpleErrorData message reporting what failed.

putCollectionItem

@RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8",
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object putCollectionItem(@RequestParam(value="itemid",defaultValue="-1")
                                               long itemID,
                                               @RequestBody
                                               com.ac.games.data.CollectionItem item)
A simple PUT command to update the user. This will update all fields for a collection, but the itemID cannot be changed. This value must match the param itemID.

Parameters:
itemID - The itemID we intend to update. This is required
collection - The collection data we want to update. This is required.
Returns:
a SimpleMessageData indicating the operation succeeded, or a SimpleErrorData indicating it failed.

postCollectionItem

@RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8",
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object postCollectionItem(@RequestBody
                                                com.ac.games.data.CollectionItem item)
A simple POST command to update the user. This will insert a new collection.

Parameters:
collection - The collection data we want to insert. This is required.
Returns:
a SimpleMessageData indicating the operation succeeded, or a SimpleErrorData indicating it failed.

deleteCollectionItem

@RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object deleteCollectionItem(@RequestParam(value="itemid",defaultValue="-1")
                                                  long itemID)
DELETE Method, which should delete the provided collection reference, if it exists

Parameters:
itemID -
Returns:
A SimpleMessageData or SimpleErrorData message indicating the operation status
